explanation:
code_hardening: Preserved the original null-handling for the fontSizeStrings parameter by defensively substituting DEFAULT_FONT_SIZE_STRINGS and assigning it to the instance field; marked the parameter final for clarity without changing behavior.
resolve_compilation_errors: Introduced the private init(String[]) method expected by the existing constructors and ensured all referenced Swing classes and fields already present in the class are used consistently without changing signatures.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Replaced the contentsPanel layout from GridLayout(2,1) to BorderLayout, added the selection panel to BorderLayout.CENTER and the sample panel to BorderLayout.SOUTH so resizing behavior matches the intended UI (selection expands, sample anchored at bottom).
refactoring: Moved all UI-construction logic previously in the public constructor into this single private init method, keeping the call order and responsibilities of getFontFamilyPanel, getFontStylePanel, getFontSizePanel, getSamplePanel, and setSelectedFont unchanged.
misc: none.
